SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

br.octahedron.cotopaxi.metadata.annotation
Annotation Type LoginRequired

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface LoginRequired

Annotation to specify that the user authentication is required to execute an Action.

Author:
Danilo Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Optional Element Summary
 String forbiddenURL
          Specify the Login URL to redirect non authorized users
 String loginURL
          Specify the Login URL to redirect non logged users
 String requiredRole
          Specify the user's required roles to access the method
 

requiredRole

public abstract String requiredRole
Specify the user's required roles to access the method

Default:
""

loginURL

public abstract String loginURL
Specify the Login URL to redirect non logged users

Default:
"/login"

forbiddenURL

public abstract String forbiddenURL
Specify the Login URL to redirect non authorized users

Default:
"/forbidden"
